title: Can i get my rp back
body: so i just got a 25$ rp card which gives you 3500 rp i bought 2 skins pool party lee sin for 975 and blood moon thresh for 975 but it took more rp than the skin needed now i have 591 rp when i should have 1566 and also i had 16 rp left over from another rp card so what can i do to get it back or was it all just a bug?

replies.body:
Hey shadowrestar,

This is likely a visual bug. As other have said, please try and restart your client. If this wasn't visual, and you're actually missing RP, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) and we can see what's going on with your account/RP.

First make sure it isn't a display error. Log out and back in.

(The same bug sometimes causes IP to appear as negative)
it's a visual bug you have the RP that you didnt spend
